summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1140, for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 29 and 15; 28 and 16; 27 and 17; 35 and 18, all in the replat of Green Lake Home Addition to the City of Seattle, from North Seventy-seventh Street to Stroud Avenue; Stroud Avenue from the alley between Blocks 23 and 18 in said replat to North Eightieth Street; North Eightieth Street from Stroud Avenue to Wallingford Avenue; and Wallingford Avenue from East Green Lake Boulevard to North Eighty-second Street; all in the City of Seattle of Seattle by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12907 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
